attributes.action: Ban e bikes and scooters from riding on pavements
attributes.additional_details:
The situation is getting out of hand and its  unsafe to continue allowing this to carry on
How many more pedestrians need to be killed or seriously injured before action is taken
Pedestrians should feel safe walking on pavements sadly this is not the case
attributes.background: Make it illegal to ride e bikes and scooters on pavements with fines given for breaking this law

rejection.details:
It is already illegal to ride an e-scooter on the pavement in the UK and the fine for doing this is a fixed penalty notice of £50.

If you would like changes to this, you could submit a petition about that.
